body.name: Ello Cooper Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw and Carry Handle, Double Walled and Vacuum Insulated Metal, Leak Proof Locking Lid with Soft Silicone Spout, Reusable, BPA Free, 22oz, 32oz, 40oz
features: KEEPS COLD ALL DAY: Double-walled and vacuum insulated to keep drinks cold up to 24 hours. Stay hydrated no matter where life takes you with our reliable water bottle.

100% LEAK-PROOF: Our bottle features a secure, leak-proof seal, allowing you to toss it in your bag worry-free. The added locking mechanism further ensures spill-free peace of mind in backpacks, purses, and gym bags.

SOFT SILICONE STRAW: The protective cover ensures a clean spout, making it perfect for your on-the-go lifestyle. Plus, sipping from the soft silicone straw adds an extra element of fun to your hydration routine.
TRAVEL FRIENDLY: Take your water bottle wherever life takes you, thanks to the integrated carry loop. Attach it to your backpack, gym bag, or carry it by hand.

EASY TO CLEAN: Lid is top rack dishwasher safe, which makes cleaning a breeze. While we recommend handwashing the body for optimal longevity, feel free to toss it in the dishwasher if you prefer. All parts are BPA free.
body.description: The Ello Cooper 22oz, 32oz, and 40oz Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle features a soft silicone straw and a locking, leak-proof flip lid to keep the drink surface fully covered during transport. Cooper goes above and beyond, keeping your beverages ice-cold for an impressive 24+ hours. Crafted from premium 18/8 stainless steel, it boasts an ultra-durable powder coat finish that resist chipping and rust. Cleaning is a breeze; while we recommend handwashing the body for longevity, you can also toss it in the dishwasher for easy maintenance. All parts are BPA-free. Express your style with our selection of vibrant colors, allowing our Cooper to complement your lifestyle and personal fashion statement.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ello Cooper Vacuum Insulated Double Walled Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Soft Straw and Carry Loop The Ello Cooper Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle features a soft silicone straw and a locking, leak-proof flip lid to keep the drink surface fully covered during transport. Cooper keeps drinks cold up to 20+ hours and features 18/8 stainless steel with an ultra-durable powder coat finish that won't chip or rust.

LEAK PROOF One touch locking flip lid with silicone push button helps ensure your bottle always stays leak free. EASY CARE Lids are easy to disassemble and top rack dishwasher safe, which makes cleaning a breeze. Hand wash body recommended. TRAVEL FRIENDLY Built in carry loop enables you to carry it with ease or attach it to a backpack. Designed to fit a car cup holder and gym equipment easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best water bottle I’ve ever owned
reviews.reviewText: I love this water bottle! I bought 2 so I can rotate between them. They look great and come in so many fun colors. They don’t leak hardly at all (after a lot of use I found one leaking a little bit but my newer one is still totally leak proof). They keep my water cold for hours but don’t have any condensation on the outside of the bottle. The mouthpiece is good and you can use it with or without the straw. It is also really easy to clean with a straw cleaner, and the straw is clear so I can be sure there isn’t anything gross growing in there. I will never buy another water bottle. I’ve dropped mine several time and don’t have any dents at all!Also: oh the ello website you can buy replacement lids if needed :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Water Bottle
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle is huge! It’s amazing quality, has an easy to use lid, straw, and carrying hook and it is easy to clean! It also keeps water cool for hours and comes in great colors! Highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE this bottle
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried a ton of insulated bottles and mugs over the years and this one is by far my favorite, both because it’s a straw (you don’t have to tilt the mug to drink out of it you just hold it up to your mouth vertically - this is a real plus if you have ice in it, because tilting with ice sometimes means either a gush or the opening blocked by ice), and also because of the flip-cap that covers the whole top (if you’re moving through a crowd that keeps your sippy-hole nice and clean from other people’s germs, or if you’re on the beach or trail it keeps dirt and sand off the entire top - I love that). Not to mention it does stay very cold (as cold as any other brands I’ve tried, longer than most), and I really like having the carabiner option (in the gym you can clip your keys to it, or on the go you can clip it to your bag or pack). The powder coating is NOT indestructible, I did manage to put a scratch on one while rock climbing - cup still works fine, it’s just a cosmetic blemish, but if you know you’re going to be banging it around on rocks or metal, you might consider using a sleeve of some sort to try to protect it. It’s nice they come in such a variety of pleasant colors, too, if you have multiple people using them or if you use them for different kinds of drinks it’s nice having them color coded (like one of mine I ONLY ever use for water, then I have others I will use for other beverages). These things are a MUST on a cruise or flight, and great if you’re on any kind of international travel when you’re active and thirsty and the last thing you need is to be sick from drinking unclean ice or water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thumbs up for this product.
reviews.reviewText: I liked that it holds 40oz. The handle is very sturdy. It keeps things cold for very long. The mouthpiece is soft. I like the security of moving the dial so no liquids will come out. Overall 10 out of 10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like these water bottles. They are quite durable. Mine has been subjected to a few harsh falls and other than one tiny and insignificant dent, it's still perfectly fine. I think the lid on the 40 ounce bottle is more durable than the smaller size. The lid threads inside of the bottle instead of screwing onto the top. It keeps water very cold for a very long time. The only downside is it does not fit in a cup holder, and it's size (40 oz) makes it kinda awkward to hold onto. There is a tiny "handle" on the lid, but that's it. I'm fond of the mouthpiece, it's comfortable to drink from and easy to clean, and I like that I can lock the cap that goes over it so it does not spill when tipped over. I think that's especially important when it does not fit into a cupholder.So yeah, very durable, 10 out of 10 on keeping water cold, and worth purchasing IMO. If Ello designs a water bottle with a large capacity that narrows down at the bottom to fit into a cupholder I would be super stoked, but this one is pretty good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Bottle
reviews.reviewText: I've had an issue lately where most water bottles have a little rubber grommet that inserts into the top of the bottle that doesn't allow enough air to get decent suction through the straw, and will occasionally get stuck to the straw, gets pulled out, and gets lost when you flip up the straw (first picture)This bottle has a built in grommet that seems to be partially blocked by the sealing o-ring on the inside (second picture) but does NOT have any issues with suction. There IS a little bit of a swooshing sound whenever you drink from it due to the o-ring, but I don't personally consider it an issue.Otherwise the bottle itself seems like a decent quality metal, comes with a locking lid, and the straw tip is very unique but shockingly pleasant to use.Would definitely buy again; considering getting some additional colors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite grown-up sippy cup :)
reviews.reviewText: I am odd in that I don't like a straw water bottle - I like to tip it back and drink that way. This water bottle is the best one I've found for that - the soft spout never bangs me in the lip and has enough of a seal that it won't leak, but you don't need to use a lot of suction. Hence, "grown up sippy cup." The 22 oz size fits in a standard cup holder and the loop handle is easy to hang on a bag, on a hook, etc. All of the pieces come apart easily for washing and replacement pieces are easily available when needed. The only criticism is that the teeth on the top of the lid which keep it locked into the bottom can break off if you're not careful. Once they do, you have to replace the whole lid. But, not enough of a problem to keep me from buying 10+ of these now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT! Keeps coffee warm for hours
reviews.reviewText: Love the size. Loveee the print. However, thank god it has a little handle on the lid - because the outter material is VERY SLIPPERY! When it’s full and heavy, you can’t hold it on the side, it slips! But overall, love it.
Like it very much, however wanting another color as well is double the price! And will not pay double for exact same one in a different color.
Keeps my water cold all day. Doesn’t leak. Pretty colours too
Es muy grande, cómodo de usar y transportar.Sin fugas de agua

reviews.reviewTitle: No lo duden, es un excelente producto!!!
reviews.reviewText: La verdad me impresionó. Tiene muy buena calidad, es ligero y cumple con todo lo que promete. 10/10.

El color es tal cual se muestra en las imágenes, su capacidad para mantener el agua fría durante un tiempo prolongado ha superado mis expectativas, y el bloqueo es totalmente fiable para evitar derrames accidentales.
